description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Cloud Files mini filter driver elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-38215), the following updates must be applied:

1. Download and install the appropriate KB update based on your Windows version:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: Install KB5041571.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: Install KB5041585.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Install KB5041585.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Install KB5041592.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: Install KB5041580.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: Install KB5041580.
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (32-bit): Install KB5041580.
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (32-bit): Install KB5041580.

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This set of updates resolves an elevation of privilege issue linked to an integer overflow or wraparound flaw found in the Windows Cloud Files mini filter driver. System administrators are advised to prioritize these updates to maintain system integrity and security against potential exploits.
- For manual installation, download the relevant updates from:
   - [KB5041571](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041571)
   - [KB5041585](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041585)
   - [KB5041580](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041580)
   - [KB5041592](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5041592)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is updated to match the specified Windows version.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installations.
